_sText:
This is the remake of my first jail map.
Some of you may know ba_jail_assassinator_final, others not, but the map was a bit simple.
With the time I learned new stuff, and I decided to remake the ENTIRE map.
The map has a completely new layout, and design in most parts of the map.
The map contains:
- Big cage
- Cells(open automatically after 1 minute) 
- Medic
- Football
- Pool with toilets
- Sauna
- Solitary 
- Disco
- Playground 
- Kitchen
- Last request room
- Store with a secret room
- Secrets
- Tower to control the terrorists
- 69 spawns(32 T's and 38 ct's)
Some notes:
- To open the cells, you need to climb the tower, where the button to open the cells is.
- After I launched the map for test, I found some minor bugs, but nothing important, so don't worry :P
-----
Hope you enjoy playing on the map, as I enjoyed making it =D
Rate and comment please =)
